outcome: The Harmonists maintain power, focusing on stabilizing the system temporarily.

events.description: The Harmonists convene a closed meeting, emphasizing immediate stabilization and freezing any system expansions temporarily.
BCI scores show slight improvements in synchronization, causing public relief as delays begin to lessen.
A symposium on technological ethics is held, sparking debate over the moral implications of the BCI system.
Council factions engage in quiet negotiations to ensure the Harmonists' continued influence.
